lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Brazil insists its debt service obligations should in no way interfere with growth priorities, a position putting the issue of debt relief squarely into focus for the first time, officials and delegates said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Washington wants to involve the IADB in its debt strategy through increased lending, but as the bank's largest single shareholder it also wants to require countries to adopt far-reaching economic reforms to qualify for loans.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S.-backed reforms in the Inter-American Development Bank (IADB) underscores the mounting challenge to Washington's current debt strategy, according to Latin American officials and delegates to the IADB meeting that begins here today.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Brazil insists its debt service obligations should in no way interfere with growth priorities, a position putting the issue of debt relief squarely into focus for the first time, officials and delegates said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Washington wants to involve the IADB in its debt strategy through increased lending, but as the bank's largest single shareholder it also wants to require countries to adopt far-reaching economic reforms to qualify for loans.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S.-backed reforms in the Inter-American Development Bank (IADB) underscores the mounting challenge to Washington's current debt strategy, according to Latin American officials and delegates to the IADB meeting that begins here today.
